name: N'ice Cream: Idle Startup
description:
N'ice Cream Shop offers healthy homemade ice creams made from all-natural, wholesome vegan ingredients like fruits, berries, and plant-based milk and nuts. Grow your Ice Cream shop by selling sweet ice cream, cakes, popsicles and enjoy upgrading your Ice Cream Empire!

Are you a true Ice Cream Lover? Become an Ice Cream tycoon, build an empire, earn money, build a business, level up, make more money and get rich in this idle tycoon simulator game where you can make money by investing! Do you like idle tycoon games and earning money simulators? Want to be an Ice Cream inc. owner? N’ice Cream Idle Startup Tycoon game is a simulation that mixes restaurant management and earning tons of money to become a rich capitalist millionaire.

Explore different Icy Desserts, different styles of ice creams, cakes, frozen yogurts, and even coffees! Upgrade your shop by selling desserts to the customers; they can choose anything from popsicle sticks, ice cream to cupcakes, and many more!

FEATURES:
- Collect idle gold, even when offline
- Over 6 unique products to explore
- Collect all kinds of upgrades
- Beautiful 3D environments to explore
- Relaxing music
- Hire chefs, waiters, cashiers, and baristas

Discord - Become a member of N'ice Cream community!
https://discord.com/invite/gPPRzQs6D8

Any problems or suggestions?
Contact: hello@herogamestudio.com

- Your N’ice Cream Idle Startup Team -
